resources.string: \"No, you clearly don\'t know who you\'re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I AM the danger!\"

I’m a mobile developer in México city and Free Software enthusiastic, since I started I’ve always been concerned about learning how to teach. I am also an active collaborator in Mozilla Mexico. I\'ve created two development communities in my school and I am always looking for new challenges
